New Records: Pakistan won by 10 wickets, which is a significant achievement in T20I cricket.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 31 runs, including key wickets of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli.
Virat Kohli scored 57 runs off 49 balls.
Rishabh Pant contributed 39 runs off 30 balls.
Mohammad Rizwan scored an unbeaten 79 off 55 balls.
Babar Azam scored an unbeaten 68 off 52 balls.
Pakistan chased down the target of 152 runs in 17.5 overs without losing any wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi was named Player of the Match for his impactful bowling performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
This was the 16th match of Group 2 in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2021.
